post_content.caption: Viral: Kohli Fan Thrashed Mercilessly For Breaching Security To Touch Kohli's Feet I Watch
post_content.description:
A video capturing a fan hugging Virat Kohli at a Bengaluru stadium went viral. Filmed by an onlooker, the emotional yet chaotic scene garnered cheers. However, the fan was later reportedly thrashed by bouncers, a moment also caught on video, requested to be blurred. Kohli intervened, urging security for leniency, highlighting this as a memorable yet controversial fan moment, sparking widespread online discussion.
